desc: Modarta is a premium retail brand for pashmina & woolen stoles , shawls , potli bags and mufflers for men & women. Recently we have added waist belts as well. We are placed at various fashion platforms such as Nykaa Fashion , Jaypore, Limeroad etc . All our products are handcrafted & hand embroidered with love & care.

layout.text: Experience the warmth, softeness and richness of pashmina with Modarta. Handwoven with love & care. We deliver all over the World.
